participant_1.personality: Sophie is an optimistic and creative individual who loves expressing herself through art and enjoys the company of her friends.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. i turned 18 years old yesterday.
